import sys

fib=[0,1,4,7,10,13,17,20,24,28,32,35,41,44,48,53,58,61,67,70,76,81,85,88,96,100,104,109,115,118,126,129,135,140,144,149,158,161,165,170,178,181,189,192,198,205,209,212,222,226,232,237,243,246,254,259,267,272,276,279,291,294,298,305,312,317,325,328,334,339,347,350,362,365,369,376,382,387,395,398,408,414,418,421,433,438,442,447,455,458,470,475,481,486,490,495,507,510,516,523,532,535,543,546,554,563,567,570,582,585,593,598,608,611,619,624,630,637,641,646,662,666,670,675,681,686,698,701,709,714,722,725,737,742,746,755,763,766,774,777,789,794,798,803,818,823,827,834,840,843,855,858,866,873,881,886,898,901,905,910,922,927,937,940,946,955,959,962,978,982,990,997,1003,1006,1014,1021,1031,1036,1040,1043,1061,1064,1072,1077,1085,1090,1098,1103,1109,1118,1126,1129,1143,1146,1150,1159,1168,1171,1183,1186,1198,1203,1207,1212,1224,1229,1233,1240,1250,1255,1271,1274,1280,1285,1289,1294,1310,1315,1319,1324,1336,1341,1349,1352,1364,1374,1378,1381,1393,1396,1404,1413,1421,1424,1436,1441,1447,1452,1460,1463,1483,1486,1492,1499,1505,1512,1520,1525,1533,1538,1546,1549,1567,1572,1576,1585,1594,1597,1605,1610,1622,1629,1633,1636,1652,1657,1665,1670,1676,1679,1695,1698,1708,1717,1721,1728,1740,1743,1747,1754,1770,1773,1781,1784,1790,1799,1807,1812,1830,1834,1842,1847,1853,1856,1868,1873,1881,1890,1894,1899,1917,1922,1926,1931,1941,1946,1958,1961,1973,1978,1986,1989,2005,2008,2012,2025,2031,2034,2042,2047,2061,2066,2074,2079,2094,2101,2105,2110,2118,2123,2139,2142,2148,2155,2159,2164,2184,2187,2193,2198,2210,2215,2227,2232,2240,2249,2253,2256,2268,2271,2283,2292,2304,2307,2315,2320,2326,2335,2339,2342,2366,2370,2374,2381,2393,2398,2406,2409,2419,2426,2434,2439,2451,2454,2462,2471,2479,2484,2500,2503,2515,2520,2524,2527,2543,2552,2556,2563,2569,2572,2588,2593,2605,2610,2614,2619,2637,2640,2644,2653,2668,2671,2679,2684,2690,2701,2709,2714,2730,2733,2741,2746,2752,2757,2769,2774,2786,2791,2799,2802,2826,2829,2833,2840,2848,2855,2863,2868,2874,2883,2891,2894,2914,2917,2925,2934,2940,2945,2953,2 t=input()
for test in range(0,t):
	n=sys.stdin.readline()
	n=int(n)
	print fib[n]
